name: AIIA AI1A/PG0118-2024 Intelligent Vehicle Agent Service Capability Evaluation Specification
use_case: Provides evaluation criteria for intelligent vehicle agent service capabilities including perception, interaction, and safety compliance.
data_summary: Requires documentation of training datasets, scenario coverage, and performance metrics for intelligent agents.
monitoring: Recommends periodic re-evaluation to track capability improvements and maintain certification.
emergency_plan: Calls for contingency procedures for safety-critical failures in intelligent agent services.
obligations: Demonstrate compliance with evaluation indicators across perception, cognition, and service modules.
Provide benchmark test results and validation scenarios for automotive agent functions.
Maintain traceable documentation for datasets, models, and deployment environments.
